Once we get an update from them I will make sure to give you an update. For the inconvenience. I have gone and applied a 10% discount towards the order. ğŸ’œğŸ™Kindly wait for 3-5 business days for the refund to reflect on the original payment method. â¤ï¸Rest assured we will keep an eye on this and keep you posted via email.
If there's anything we can do to make your experience with us even more positive or if you have specific preferences or needs, please don't hesitate to let us know. We are here to support you in any way we can. ğŸ’•
Wishing you a wonderful rest of your week Manal![redacted_name]
